model_input:
[Task Description]
You will be given DIALOGUE CONTEXT and MEMORY.
You job is to judge if MEMORY contains helpful past information for a language model, representing Unknown, to generate a proper next response based on DIALOGUE CONTEXT.

Say "Yes" if MEMORY contains such helpful information and say "No" if it dose not.
Provide a brief explanation for your judgement.

[Format Regulation]
Generate your output below OUTPUT using the following format:
Brief explanation: your explanation
Judgement: "Yes" or "No"

[Task]
DIALOGUE CONTEXT:
Speaker A: I went out and got a pizza, and when I got home Journey ate a whole piece by herself!

MEMORY:
User Description:
Speaker B works in an AC warehouse and pulls parts as a part-time job. They have 2 dogs who are terriers and they enjoy cruises. Speaker B is not in a rush to find a new job and is considering taking a Disney cruise during their break.

Relationship Description:
Speaker A, the robot, and Speaker B plan a house concert with their pets. Speaker A will start playing music for less dangerous animals and will try using vinegar to get rid of odors after work. Speaker B's dogs are described as Zen masters, and they are planning a play date for their pets with Speaker A's pet raccoon. 

Event Description:
Speaker A tried playing music for the white tigers at the zoo, and the white tigers seemed to enjoy it. Speaker A has a pet raccoon named Journey and a bearded dragon named Sid. Speaker B suggested trying vinegar to neutralize odors at home. Speaker B's friend found two baby raccoons, one of which was given to Speaker A. Speaker A has been working at their job for almost 10 years and has only taken 3 vacations in that time. Speaker A prefers camping over cruises, while Speaker B wants to take a Disney cruise. Speaker A is not interested in cruises but knows people who have enjoyed them.
current_dialogue: Speaker A: I went out and got a pizza, and when I got home Journey ate a whole piece by herself!

speaker: Unknown
raw_prediction: Response: Have you tried using vinegar to keep Journey away from the food? I remember you mentioning it as a solution for neutralizing odors at home. Maybe that could help with keeping her from eating the pizza next time!
prediction:
